entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for October 06, 2024

summary.caption: Darrell suspected someone had once again slipped him a trick spoon with the concave side reversed.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for October 06, 2024

summary.caption: “You moron! ... I told you it was only a mirage!”
